titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CDS MESSAGE REFERENCE - Description

div.p: CDS MESSAGE REFERENCE Â is the same as attribute CDS MESSAGE REFERENCE.

Usage: For each message within an interchange the CDS MESSAGE REFERENCE is assigned to provide a unique identity (within an interchange). Although the data is configured in a 14 alpha-numeric format, a maximum value of 9999999 is permitted in the format of n7. Wrap around from 9999999 to 1 must be supported.
